extendedInfo.description: Read the latest news in science research. Daily news feeds from the renowned site sciencedaily.com .Read articles from a wide range of fields ,including medicine, physics, psychology, mathematics, computer science, climate, space, astronomy etc.Portrait and Landscape orientations supported.RSS Links:â Latest Newsâ Computers & Mathâ Matter & Energyâ Mind & Brainâ Health & Medicineâ Space & Time â Earth & Climateâ Science & Societyâ Fossils & Ruinsâ Strange ScienceTags: technology, sciencedaily, rss, news, technology news, biology, health, neuroscience, nanotechnology, physics, technews, science, newsreader, daily news, brain, astrophysics , mathematics, electronics, engineering.

reviews.title: A Must Have !
reviews.comment: This app is a must have for anyone that wants to keep up with the latest science news.  With the update it works fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what it should do
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for a morning read or a long comute through the city when you want to read up on what\'s happening in science.
reviews.author: Mihai Radu Ionescu

reviews.title: Best site !
reviews.comment: Best site for the latest science news ...
reviews.author: Liu Weng

reviews.title: Daily Science
reviews.comment: Not very impressed, too many items display - Forbidden
reviews.author: Paul Hopkins

reviews.title: Used to be great...
reviews.comment: ...but all of a sudden everything says \'forbidden\' when clicking on any of the categories. So now it is useless
reviews.author: Christine I

reviews.title: Good work....
reviews.comment: Fast info + connects to science daily..... nice work. Simple and smart.
reviews.author: Ryan F

reviews.title: Great base, needs more
reviews.comment: I\'m so happy to have discovered a reliable Science Daily RSS app, but a few things need improvement. First, while getting past the lack of a \"new headlines\" or \"most recent\" category on the title page isn\'t too hard--though the feature would be welcome--getting past the bright yellow text on the feed screen is. The basic, sort of boring light blue on the home screen of the app is underwhelming but after the visual assault of those highlighter-yellow titles, you find yourself wishing for its return. HTC EVO.
reviews.author: Karianne Muckle

reviews.title: Excellent application!
reviews.comment: Very basic,but works reliably well. I study science, so it keeps me informed on many topics. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Intuitive user friendly
reviews.comment: Very basic but great.  No memory hogging bullship
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Totally essential
reviews.comment: For anyone looking to educate themselves at their own convenience, this app is right for you. Intuitive and informative. I love it, needless to say..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: With an update this app works great.
reviews.author: Daniel Baker
